CatDescriptText: "Downtown Division, chairmen J. S. Smith & W. H. Martie, goal $300,000, Brigade & Chairmen, Carl Block, Mrs. G. R. Schreiner, R. Ritchey, Chm'n, Mrs. Hallock C. Sherrard, Mrs. Scott, Chm'n, Mr. M. W. Johnson, Mr. Leland Hazard..."
TitMainTitle: Man wearing double breasted suit and goatee, possibly Paul Robeson, standing behind microphone at banquet table with large flower arrangement in foreground, and sign in background reading "Downtown Division, chairmen J. S. Smith & W. H. Martie, goal $300,000..."
